text: There are lots of ways to structure this, but the name of the game is keeping it simple. You should be able to log in to the platform. You should place your trades. Takes less than 60 seconds straight up. You come back not mid week, not mid month after expiration. If it's set up like this, it doesn't matter what happens. You just come back to see what happened so that you can make the necessary next steps in the strategy.
